participant_1.background:
I want a modern and stylish home that reflects my vibrant personality.
I love playing with my husky.
my hobby is sewing.
I make a batch of my favorite soap and smell it while I relax.
My youthful appearance and my interesting stories make me a good conversationalist.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.

content.text: I'm really enjoying my time here, I'm so glad I decided to move to this city!
I'm glad to hear that, what made you decide to move here?
I was looking for a change of scenery, and I've always loved the 80s music scene here.
That's awesome, I love the 80s music scene here too!
I'm also a big fan of antique stores, and there are so many great ones here.
Me too! I love going to antique stores and finding hidden gems.
What are some of your favorite bands from the 80s?
I love The Smiths, The Cure, and Depeche Mode.
I love all of those bands too!
Me too! Do you play any music?
I used to play the guitar, but I haven't played in a long time.
Oh, that's too bad. I play the drums.
That's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument.
You should learn! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to give it a try.
You should! It's a great way to relax and have some fun.
